title: Hard problem with the game.
body:
Hi guys. Recently my computer is having some problems then I moved on an old pc. I downloaded the game and I started a game vs bots to change some graphics setting. After I changed the settings (to low graphics and I reduced the resolutions) the game won't start (the screen just became black then the computer just blocked). I had to turn off and turn on the pc, then I started the client and the game and the problem just repeat. I can't start a game. 

I'm searching for a solution but I can't find nothing. What I can do? I need to change setting out the game but I can't.

replies.body: If you have a black screen but can't hear any game sounds, this might not actually be a settings issue!  Instead, this can happen if your connection is struggling to reach the game server so it can't download any assets.   Instead of settings, run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your network.  I hope that helps!

No the problem isn't the connection, because the game start, with the login screen (where I can see the champs and the spells) but after it end the game just go on the black screen then my pc just get blocked

Can you hear game sounds?  This could be a different issue then where drivers or game files are failing to render the match.  You may also want to go over each step of the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to make sure your PC settings are able to play the game.  Double check the [minimum requirements](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements) guide to make sure the game can play on this older rig as well.
No, I can't hear nothing while the screen is black. The problem is that the computer isn't able to start the game after I changed the graphic options so I don't know how I can change it.
Thanks for the update!  Give the FPS guide a go, and test it in a custom game.  Let me know how that goes for you.

Yeah the problem is just my computer. The fps is too low. 

I can't play with that computer... But thank you for the help.
